summary: Shady stockbroker and abusive husband Gerald Parker is found dead in the penguin pool of a NYC aquarium after being knocked cold by his wife's boyfriend.
cast: Edna May Oliver|Robert Armstrong|James Gleason|Mae Clarke|Donald Cook|Edgar Kennedy|Clarence Wilson|James Donlan|Gustav von Seyffertitz|William Le Maire|Joe Hermano|Guy Usher|Rochelle Hudson|Wilfrid North|A.S. 'Pop' Byron|Edith Fellows|Chuck Hamilton|Mary Mason|Sidney Miller|Dorothy Vernon
title: Asesinato en el acuario
